maqras.text: Kare (shito) ga,`nanto, sosen ga shitagatte ita anata gata no shiru mono yori mo, yoi michibiki o motarashite mo ka.' To iu to kare-ra wa,`anata ga todoketa mono wa, watashi-tachi wa shinjimasen.' To itta
sorede ware wa, kare-ra ni hofuku shita. Miyo, shinko o kyohi shita mono no saigo ga dodeatta ka o
Iburahimu ga, sono chichi to sono hitobito ni ko itta toki no koto o omoiokose. `Hontoni watashi wa, anata gataga suhai suru mono to zetsuen shimasu
Watashi o o tsukuri ni nari, watashi o kanarazu onmichibiki kudasa reru kata ni dake (tsukaemasu)
Kare wa sore o, shison e no eien no kotoba to shite nokoshita. Kanarazu kare-ra wa (omoni) kaeru kotoba to (omotte)
Iya, ware wa, shinri ga kare-ra no tokoro ni kite, shito ga (jibutsu o) meiryo ni suru made, korera no mono ya, sono sosen no mono o, kyoraku sa seta
Daga, shinri ga kare-ra no tokoro ni kita to naru to,`koreha majutsudesu. Watashi-tachi wa, kesshite kore o shinjimasen.' To iu
Mata kare-ra wa,`kono kuruan wa, naze 2tsu no machi no yuryokuna jinbutsu ni kudasa renakatta nodeshou ka.' To iu

Kare-ra wa omo no jihi o wariateru no ka. Ware wa, gense no kurashi ni hitsuyonamono o, anata gata ni haibun shi, mata aru mono o soto no mono yori ue ni chii o age, aru mono o soto ni fukusa seru. Anata no omo no jihi wa, kare-ra ga chikuseki shita mono yori, haruka ni totoi nodearu
Ningen ga (subete fushinjin'na) ichidan to naru osore ga nakereba, ware wa jihibukaki okata o shinjinai mono no tame ni, sono-ka ni wa gin no yane, sore ni noboru no ni (gin no) kaidan o moke
sono-ka ni wa (gin no) tobira, mata kare-ra o (gin no) nedoko ni yorikakara seyou
Mata kin no soshoku mo (hodokoshitadearou). Shikashi korera no subete wa, gense no seikatsu no kyoraku ni suginai. Anata no omo no omoto no raise koso ga,-nushi o osoreru mono no tame no monodearu
Jihibukaki okata no kunkai ni me o tsumuru mono ni wa, ware wa shaitan o furi ateru. Sore wa, kare ni tori hanare gatai tomo to narou
Koshite (akuma wa tadashi) michi kara kare-ra o kobamu, shikamo kare-ra wa, jibun wa (tadashiku) michibika rete iru mono to omoikonde iru
Ware no moto ni yattekuru toki ni natte, kare wa,`watashi to anata (akuma) no ma ni, azuma to nishi no hedatari ga attanaraba.' To iu. A nanto warui tomo (o motta koto) yo
Anata gata wa aku o okonatte ita nodakara, kyo to natte wa nani o itte mo yakudatanai. Anata gata wa mina chobatsu o ukeru
Anata wa mimi o katamukenai mono ni kika seru koto ga dekiyou ka. Mata mewosorasu-sha ya, akiraka ni mayoi ya ayamachi no naka ni iru mono o, michibiku koto ga dekiyou ka
Sore de tatoe anata o meshiagete mo, ware wa kanarazu kare-ra ni hofuku suru
Mata kare-ra ni yakusoku shita koto o, anata ni miseru koto mo dekiru. Ware ga kare-ra o seiatsu suru nado itomo tayasui
Sorede anata ni keiji shita mono o, shikkari to mamore. Hontoni anata wa, tadashi michi o tadotte iru
Kore wa anata ni tottemo, mata anata no hitobito ni tottemo, tadashiku kunkaidearu. Yagate anata gata wa,(sekimu ni tsuki) towa reru nodearu
Anata izen ni ware ga tsukawashita, shito-tachi ni toi nasai. Ware wa, jihibukaki okata igai ni tsukaerubeki kamigami o oita no ka
Hontoni ware wa, musa ni samazamana shirushi o mota sete, firuaun to sono choro-tachi ni noko wa shita. Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa, hontoni ban'yu no omo no shitodesu
Tokoroga, waga shuju no shirushi o gen wa shita no ni, miyo. Kare-ra wa sore o azakeri waratta

Sorede ware ga tsugitsugini kare-ra ni shimeshita shirushi wa, dore mo sono nakama no mono yori, idaina monodeatta. Soshite chobatsu o motte kare-ra o korashimeta. Kanarazu kare-ra wa (ware no moto ni) kaerudearou (koto o omotte)
Sonotoki kare-ra wa itta. `Majutsu-shi yo,-nushi ga anata to musuba reta yakusoku ni yotte, watashi-tachi no tame ni inotte kudasai. Watashi-tachi wa hontoni michibiki o ukeirerudeshou
Daga, ware ga kare-ra kara chobatsu o torinozoku to, dojini kare-ra wa sono yakusoku o yabutte shimatta

Soshite firuaun wa sono min ni senkoku shite itta. `Waga min yo, Ejiputo kokudo, soshite korera ashimoto o nagareru kawa wa, watashi no monode wa nai nodesu ka. Anata gata wa (son'na koto ga) wakaranai nodesu ka
Watashi wa, kono iyashi, meiryo ni ii arawasu koto mo dekinai mono yori mo, sugurete iru nodesu
Naze kogane no ude wa ga kare ni sadzuke rarenai nodesu ka. Mata naze tenshi-tachi ga, tsukisoi tte kare to issho ni tsukawasa renai nodesu ka
Kono yo ni kare wa sono min o sendo shi,-min wa kare ni shitagatta. Hontoni kare-ra wa, arra no okite ni somuku-sha-tachideatta
Koshite kare-ra wa ware o okora setanode, ware wa kare-ra ni hofuku shi, subete o obore sase
kare-ra o kako (no min) to shi, kosei no mono no tame ni (imashime no) rei to shita
